AButton.notes: The texture-icon of the A-button for the XBOX joypad.

BButton.notes: The texture-icon of the B-button for the XBOX joypad.

XButton.notes: The texture-icon of the X-button for the XBOX joypad.

YButton.notes: The texture-icon of the Y-button for the XBOX joypad.

LBumper.notes: The texture-icon of the left-bumper for the XBOX joypad.

RBumper.notes: The texture-icon of the right-bumper for the XBOX joypad.

DPadLeft.notes: The texture-icon of the direction-pad left-button for the XBOX joypad.

DPadRight.notes: The texture-icon of the direction-pad right-button for the XBOX joypad.

DPadUp.notes: The texture-icon of the direction-pad up-button for the XBOX joypad.

DPadDown.notes: The texture-icon of the direction-pad down-button for the XBOX joypad.

DPad.notes: The texture-icon of the direction-pad for the XBOX joypad.

LStick.notes: The texture-icon of the left analog-stick for the XBOX joypad.

RStick.notes: The texture-icon of the right analog-stick for the XBOX joypad.

LTrigger.notes: The texture-icon of the left-trigger for the XBOX joypad.

RTrigger.notes: The texture-icon of the right trigger for the XBOX joypad.

Menu.notes: The texture-icon of the menu-button for the XBOX joypad.

View.notes: The texture-icon of the view-button for the XBOX joypad.

Back.notes: The texture-icon of the back-button for the XBOX joypad.

Start.notes: The texture-icon of the start-button for the XBOX joypad.
